pages.text: The first night is very dangerous if you are not prepared for it. $(br2)I recommend building you into a mountain at dusk and looking for $(item)Ores$() in the meantime. $(br2)Use the $(item)Coal$() you find to smelt food and ores and make $(item)Torches$(). $(br)And $(item)Iron Ingots$() to craft higher quality $(item)Tools$() and $(item)Armor$() for you.
But don't dig too deep and watch out for $(thing)Monsters$() in caves! $(br2)$(item)Torches$() and light prevent them from spawning.
